title: Dragon Ball GT: Gokuu Gaiden! Yuuki no Akashi wa Suushinchuu
synopsis: Years after the end of the Dragonball GT, the story continues in this special with Son Goku's now eldery granddaughter Pan, and a new generation of super saiyajins, the great-great-grandsons of Goku and Vegeta
voices: ['Nozawa, Masako', 'Nozawa, Masako', 'Minaguchi, Yuko', 'Itou, Miki', 'Furuya, Toru', 'Ootomo, Ryuuzaburou', 'Aomori, Shin', 'Sogabe, Kazuyuki']
staff: [['Watson, Barry', ['Producer']], ['Morgenstern, Tommy', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Sabat, Christopher', ['ADR Director']], ['Fukunaga, Gen', ['Executive Producer']]]
